ygData.subject: Re: Dwarven Axe
ygData.msgSnippet: ... I recieved one from a quest originating in High Keep.  I sold it for 6 pp. (I have no idea if this price was fair or not :)  The quest also returned 4 pp,
ygData.messageBody:
>From: "G2 Dan" <drockwell@...>
>
>I was talking to a fellow bard on Xegony last nite about the woes of the
>mino and how the Dwarven Axe is better. Any idea where this axe can be
>obtained, or how much it usually runs price wise? What are its stats?
>
>Gediprimie
>Xegony


I recieved one from a quest originating in High Keep. I sold it for 6 pp.
(I have no idea if this price was fair or not :) The quest also returned 4
pp, netting me 10. : ) If I remember correctly, the stats are 6 dam, 26
delay. I tried doing the quest again, but was unsuccessful, so I don't know
if this is the normal return or if it's random. I am going to attempt it
again. If you're interested it's the Bounty Hunter Quest listed at EQLizer.
Now I don't have to give the spoiler, but if anyone wants it, they know
where to find it. : )

Darkfox Reven'tsol - Xegony

Spoiler type question below if anyone's done this quest.....
















How can you remove Deputy Looh from the area to kill Bronin in peace? : )
